list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person or thing that looks exactly like another.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he is a dead ringer for his late papa
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy là một người chết đã chết cho papa muộn của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person or device that rings something.
(in certain games) a ring or similar object that is tossed so as to encircle a target.
a game of marbles in which the target marbles are placed in the center of a circular area.
